column1: @entity2 liked to play games and play sports but more than anything he liked to collectthings. He collected bottle caps. He collected sea shells. He collected baseball cards. @entity0 collected baseball cards the longest. He likes to collect the thing that he hascollected the longest the most. He once thought about collecting stamps but never did. @entity1 expensive collection was not his favorite collection. @entity2 spent the most money onhis bottle cap collection.
